name: 2018/10/24 Breakfast Broccoli Salad
description: This high-protein, low-carb, low-sugar, high-fiber Breakfast Broccoli Salad is perfect for those who are looking for a Healthyfied recipe to kickstart their day. Full of nutrients and flavors, it's a great addition to your Healthy Recipes collection.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the broccoli under cold water and chop into small florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the carrots and chop them finely.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Mince the garlic and finely dice the red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the minced garlic, diced red onion, marjoram, salt, and pepper to the beef. Stir and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the broccoli and carrots until tender, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the steamed vegetables with the beef mixture. Toss well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
